Description.Name: Medical Points
Description.Details: Medical Points are generated each day and spent to heal injured MechWarriors. Medical Points apply to all injured MechWarriors simultaneously.

temporalSetResult: [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MedTechSkill], Medical Points]] are set to {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: The company gains a +{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MedTechSkill], Medical Point]] boost for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: The company suffers a -{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MedTechSkill], Medical Point]] penalty for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResultEnd: The +{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MedTechSkill], Medical Point]] boost has expired
temporalNegativeResultEnd: The -{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MedTechSkill], Medical Point]] penalty has expired
